questions.question: What is meant by bureaucracy?
questions.answer: Bureaucracy is the permanent administrative machinery that runs government policies.

questions.question: Why is bureaucracy called permanent?
questions.answer: Because civil servants remain in service irrespective of changes in government.

questions.question: What is political neutrality?
questions.answer: It means bureaucrats serve the government without political bias.

questions.question: Name two functions of bureaucracy.
questions.answer: Implementing policies and advising ministers.

questions.question: Why is merit-based recruitment important?
questions.answer: It ensures efficiency, competence and fairness in administration.
